cn.crowdos.kernel

接口 Decomposer<T>

  • 类型参数:
    T - the type of decompositions returned by this decomposer.
    所有已知实现类:
    IndecomposableDecomposerGenerator

    public interface Decomposer<T>

    A decomposer and decompose a object that implement Decomposable into multiple fine-grained parts.

    This interface provides two styles of access to decompositions.

    • Collection style that return a List.
    • Iterator style that return a Iterator.
    // todo update doc
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0.0
    作者:
    loyx

    Decomposer

      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default List<T> decompose()
      Decompose a decomposable.
      default List<T> decompose(int scale)
      Decompose a decomposable by specified scale.
      List<T> scaleDecompose(int scale) 
      List<T> trivialDecompose() 

    • 方法详细资料

      • decompose

        default List<T> decompose()

        Decompose a decomposable. trivialDecompose() by default.

        返回:
        List style decompositions.

      • decompose

        default List<T> decompose(int scale)
                   throws DecomposeException

        Decompose a decomposable by specified scale. scaleDecompose(int) by default.

        参数:
        scale - specified decomposition scale.
        返回:
        List style decompositions.
        抛出:
        DecomposeException - if any exceptions occur during decompose.

      • trivialDecompose

        List<T> trivialDecompose()

      • scaleDecompose

        List<T> scaleDecompose(int scale)
                throws DecomposeException
        抛出:
        DecomposeException
